short_effect: Disables moves and immunities that involve flying or levitating for five turns.
effect: For the next five turns, the moves Fly, Bounce, Jump Kick, and Hi Jump Kick are disabled, and any immunities granted by the Flying type or by Levitate or Magnet Rise are disabled.

short_effect: Forces the target to have no Evade, and allows it to be hit by Psychic moves even if it is Dark.
effect: Resets the target's Evade to normal and prevents any further boosting.  If the target is Dark, it will become vulnerable to Psychic moves until it leaves battle.

effect: If the target is Sleeping, inflicts double damage and wakes it up.

short_effect: Inflicts more damage when the user has lower Speed, with a maximum of 150 power.
effect: Inflicts more damage when the target has much higher Speed, with a maximum cap of 150 power, given by: 25 * target's calculated Speed / user's calculated Speed.

short_effect: If the user faints this turn, its replacement will have its HP fully restored and any major status effect removed.
effect: If the user faints this turn, its replacement will have its HP fully restored and any major status effect removed.

Inflicts more damage when this move has less PP, with a maximum of APPROXIMATELY 190 power:
5+ PP	40 power
4 PP	50 power
3 PP	60 power
2 PP	75 power
1 PP	190 power

effect: Scatters poisoned Spikes around the opposing field, which will poison Pokemon that switch in.  Flying, Poison, and Steel Pokemon and Pokemon with Levitate are immune to this effect.  A second layer of poisoned Spikes will inflict Toxic poisoning instead.
